page.title: 11GOVERNMENT
page.content: USK AREA - FIRE STATION There is a Fire Station on on Monmouth Rd, which has two full-time Fire Prevetion Officers. When the fire alarm is raised the fire engine is very quickly manned by part-time firemen working locally, available at the time. The Fire Brigade covers a large rural area, and is not only called for house and farm fires, but also to any traffic incidents where there is fire danger. They also rescue cows from slurry pits on farms. This service is provided by the Gwent County Council.
